actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and Safety.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970, and for other purposes.
short_title: Occupational Safety and Health Act Amendments of 1983

summary.text: Occupational Safety and Health Act Amendments of 1983 - Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require the Secretary of Labor to publish, in the Federal Register, financial impact statements regarding proposed occupational health and safety standards prior to promulgating such standards as rules. Amends such Act with respect to existing facilities and equipment, inspections, promulgation of emergency standards, citations and penalties, and on-site consultations by the Secretary.

titles.title: Occupational Safety and Health Act Amendments of 1983
A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970, and for other purposes.
